籤詩版本二:
Babban pagoda ba sabon abu bane, tare da kyawawan siffofi a kowane bangare masu haskakawa.
Ina kira gare ku da ku dage da yin ruku'u da himma da kyautatawa, kuma aljanna za ta yi muku albarka.
詩意:
Wannan hexagram yana wakiltar bayyanar cancanta.
Komai yana da kyau.
解曰: Wadannan ni'imomin. Kowa yana da shi. Kar ku shagala sosai. An ƙaddara darajar a gaba.
籤詩故事一:
◇Sarkin Fenyang ya gana da jikansa a ranar soyayya ta kasar Sin
Magani: Guo Ziyi ya sadu da yarinyar masaƙa tana saukowa duniya a ranar soyayya ta kasar Sin. Tiansun, jikanyar Sarkin Jade, ita ce Fairies Bakwai.
Guo Ziyi (697-781), wanda aka fi sani da Guo Linggong, ɗan asalin gundumar Zheng ne, Huazhou (yanzu lardin Huaxian, lardin Shaanxi) kuma janar a daular Tang. Kotun daular ta baiwa Ziyi mukamin Sarkin Fenyang.
An ce Ziyi dan asalin Huazhou ne, ya je ya shiga aikin soja ne a wajen babban ganuwa, ya je birnin Beijing domin neman albashin soja, ya koma Yinzhou, ya zama ranar soyayya ta kasar Sin a wancan lokacin, iska da yashi. duhu suke yi, rana ta yi duhu, Ziyi ya kasa ci gaba, don haka yana tsaye a gefen titi, yana kwance a kasa a wani gidan da babu kowa, a lokacin da zai yi barci, sai ya ga wani haske mai ja. ta 6angaren biyu, ya mik'e ya kalleta da mamaki, sai ga wani gajimare a sararin sama yana saukowa a hankali, wata kyakkyawar mace ta zauna, mutunci da kwarjini, kwata-kwata daban da na mutane. Nan take Ziyi ya mika gaisuwar sa, ya ce, “Yau kwana na bakwai ga wata na bakwai, ina jin ‘yar masaka ce ta zo, tana son a ba ta tsawon rai da arziki.
Matar kuma ta amsa da cewa: "Da dukiya mai yawa yana da tsawo."
Bayan ya gama magana sai gajimaren ya dawo a hankali gajimare ya tashi, matar tana kallon Guo Ziyi cikin fara'a tana murmushi har ta yi nisa da ita, sai hayaki ya lumshe ya daina ganinta.
Ya zama gaskiya, kamar yadda matar ta ce. cancantar Ziyi sananne ne a duniya, shi minista ne mai farin jini sosai, kuma janar ne mai cancanta da kyawawan halaye.
聖意: Ki yi wa kanki buri a gida, ki yi wa kanki buri, addu’ar neman kudi, yin sa’a a kasuwanci, sa’a a aure, sa’a a Liujia, tafiye-tafiye da jama’a, gonaki, tsutsotsin siliki, dabbobi masu tsayayye, rashin sa’a a samu. mutane, ƙararrakin jama'a, ƙaura, sa'a, asarar dukiya, kaburbura a Zhenxingshan
古人: Sarki Fenyang ya gana da jikansa a ranar soyayya ta kasar Sin
